title: Two Sydney Men Charged Over Alleged Murder Of Innocent Man, John Versace | 10 News
description: Two men have been charged with murdering a man believed to be innocent in Condell Park earlier this year. John Versace was gunned down in the driveway of his home, and detectives say they are still trying to piece together the shooter’s intended target and motive. title: Zohran Mamdani Elected As New York Mayor In Historic Victory | 10 News
description: Voters in New York have made history, electing the city’s first Muslim mayor in a defiant show of growing anti-Trump sentiment. 34-year-old Zohran Mamdani was elected on promises of bringing economic equity back to the Big Apple, even as President Trump warned he would cut federal funds if the Democratic Socialist won. title: Opposition Leader Sussan Ley Breaks Silence Over Leadership Coup Speculation | 10 News+
description: Opposition Leader Sussan Ley has defended her track record across Australian morning television and said she is confident she will hold on to her role until the end of the year. It comes amid swirling rumours of a potential Liberal leadership coup, and the ongoing policy debate over net zero targets. title: Melbourne Tops WFH Figures, Sussan Ley Facing Competition, Glen Powell Interview | 10 News+
description: Melbourne is topping the charts when it comes to working-from-home, with up to two-thirds of employees working remotely each week. The Victorian government is proposing to make working-from-home for at least two days a week a legal right for certain jobs. But not everyone is in love with the idea. Georgie Tunny spoke to Luxury Escapes CEO Adam Schwab, who has called working-from-home “a failure on every front”.  Opposition Leader Sussan Ley has defended her track record across Australian morning television, and said she is confident she will hold on to her role until the end of the year. It comes amid swirling rumours of a potential Liberal leadership coup, and the ongoing policy debate over net zero targets.  Ever since he conquered the skies in ‘Top Gun: Maverick’, Glen Powell has become one of our favourite movie stars. He’s chased storms in ‘Twisters’, taken on a fake identity in ‘Hit Man’, and brought romance to Sydney Harbour with… Sydney Sweeney, in ‘Anyone But You’. For his latest action movie, the 37-year-old heartthrob reached out to Tom Cruise for running advice. Here’s Entertainment Editor Angela Bishop’s interview with the ‘Running Man’. title: Death Toll Rises To Seven In Kentucky Plane Crash As Investigations Continue | 10 News
description: The search for survivors is continuing in Kentucky, after a fully loaded cargo plane crashed just seconds into take-off, killing seven people.  The UPS jet was already on fire as it hurtled down the runway, and then slammed into a petrol plant, sparking an enormous explosion. title: Cough Syrup Rikodeine Misused By Teens To Make Highly Addictive 'Purple Drank' | 10 News+
description: A rapper has revealed how easy it is to purchase a highly addictive, over-the-counter drug without a script at Australian pharmacies. Cough syrup Rikodeine is a derivative of codeine, and there are now concerns teens are purchasing it to mix with soft drink or alcohol to make what’s known as “purple drank” or “lean”. Rikodeine and alcohol both slow down your breathing rate, worrying medical practitioners that, when combined, it could cause brain damage or even death.
